alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:19AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Douglas, northern Taney and Christian Counties through 245 AM CST... At 219 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ozark to near Merriam Woods to near Roberson Hollow. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ozark, Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Hollister, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Sparta, Kissee Mills, Highlandville, Rockaway Beach, Fremont Hills, Bull Creek, Taneyville, Table Rock, Kirbyville, Oldfield, Elkhead and Chestnutridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
